text:
Charlotte is throwing a party tomorrow for National Drive Electric Week. Join the celebration for music, food from electric food trucks, and thw chance to learn more about making the switch to EVs. Learn more at http://bit.ly/2kmiOhf 
#NDEW2019 @CLTSustainable @NatDriveElecWkpic.twitter.com/giU6Gl3Hfb

text: We are excited that our City Manager is trying out one of the #ElectricVehicles in our City Motorpool this week! Do you want to learn more about EVs? Stop by our event this Wednesday from 11am-2pm Uptown! pic.twitter.com/SfDzDqdTIy
text_html: We are excited that our City Manager is trying out one of the #ElectricVehicles in our City Motorpool this week! Do you want to learn more about EVs? Stop by our event this Wednesday from 11am-2pm Uptown! pic.twitter.com/SfDzDqdTIy

text: Join us in celebrating #NationalDriveElectricWeek on Sept 18 from 11am-2pm Uptown! #CLTSustainabilitypic.twitter.com/rY0J4Lefrf

text: On Sunday Sept 1st, the speed limit on I-277 is changing from 50mph - 5mph to let runners on the highway for the first time in history. Around the Crown 10K’s inaugural race is focusing on sustainability by removing 50,000+ plastic bottles/cups and we’re excited to support! pic.twitter.com/EDE6QS6F9A – at Romare Bearden Park
text_html: On Sunday Sept 1st, the speed limit on I-277 is changing from 50mph - 5mph to let runners on the highway for the first time in history. Around the Crown 10K’s inaugural race is focusing on sustainability by removing 50,000+ plastic bottles/cups and we’re excited to support! pic.twitter.com/EDE6QS6F9A – at Romare Bearden Park

text: Picking up an all-electric @chevrolet Bolt from the Government Center the night before the road trip to #SFTexpo19 @NCCleanTech @CLTgovpic.twitter.com/i9lPkKfUa6 – at Charlotte-Mecklenburg Government Center

text: The statement from Sir David is a visual horror. I mean read the words aloud and let them sit in the air and then read them again and again and let them sink in....What have we done???

text: Hi guys. Instead of printing out signs which is bad for the enviorment couldnt you protest and for instance clean the streets from junk at the same time? Then you do something for the enviorment and protest at the same time?
text_html: Hi guys. Instead of printing out signs which is bad for the enviorment couldnt you protest and for instance clean the streets from junk at the same time? Then you do something for the enviorment and protest at the same time?

text: So much love for #SSDN members @NAF2019 this week! @castroideas recognized for his work in Orlando! Our #SSCF team from #DuckHill shares their rural adaptation story, joined by @greenspacescha, our #Savannah and @CLTSustainable and others! Super Proud!
text_html: So much love for #SSDN members @NAF2019 this week! @castroideas recognized for his work in Orlando! Our #SSCF team from #DuckHill shares their rural adaptation story, joined by @greenspacescha, our #Savannah and @CLTSustainable and others! Super Proud!

text: Last night In Southpark, I had a guest from Germany on my porch and she could not believe how low and loud the planes were over my house. It went on late into the night. Peaceful no more since Nextgen Metroplex rollout and departures route change.
